title: Session date
content: Does anyone know when will the session start I know some r saying 12th August but there is no information from their side plus I am non Karnataka resident so I have to book tickets accordingly.

comments.body: same bruh, I called their reception multiple times, even they don't have the correct info for it, I also want to book tickets for advance
Are you gonna start your first sem?

If yes, then Idk
If no, then the session starts on 5th August
For lateral(3rd sem) entry they've said they're gonna tell within 12th August
You will be informed 3 days prior to session start.... atleast that's what happened last year
bruh how will I book my tickets ðŸ’€ðŸ’€
Book for 3 days after  round 2 counselling... make sure it is flexi
